name: hal
description:
HAL is a structure to efficiently store and index multiple genome
alignments and ancestral reconstructions. HAL is a graph-based
representation which provides several advantages over matrix/block-based
formats such as MAF, such as improved scalability and the ability to
perform queries with respect to an arbitrary reference or subtree.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: sonlib
dependencies.description:
sonLib is a compact C/Python library for sequence analysis in
bioinformatics.

dependencies.name: py-sonlib
dependencies.description:
Small general purpose library for C and Python with focus on
bioinformatics.
